author: Carmireli
title: Slide (Muevete)
text: Feel the bass through the floor
Tell the DJ turn it up some more
Start to sway keep it slow
Think my body 'bout to lose control
Muevete ven y coje me
Don't be afraid let me show you the way
Bailamos con el ritmo
Follow me if you wanna play
Come and slide against my "oh"
Tell me I'm the one you want to know
If you wanna taste my "oh"
Baby don't be shy I can be your guide I'll
Come and slide against your "oh"
Tell me I'm the one you'd love to know
You know I want your "oh"
Baby don't be shy hit me for a ride
Don't be scared move in close
Let my body motivate you so
Make it clear if you can
Prove to me that you could be my man
Muevete ven y coje me
Now Don't be afraid let me show you the way
Bailamos con el ritmo
Take me in make me wanna stay
(Chorus)
Esto no es un juego
Todo lo que digo es verdad
No creas que yo voy pa casa contigo
Asi que mentenga tu mente.. en bailar
Feel the bass through the floor
Tell the DJ turn it up some more
Start to sway let it flow
Make your body wanna lose control
Muevete ven y coje me
Don't be afraid now show me the way now
Bailamos con el ritmo
Follow me if you wanna taste
(Chorus) x 2
